about_the_game:
Solve Timeloop Puzzles

Each puzzle is designed with the “simple rules, deep consequences” motto in mind, with no filler or noise. Solutions aren’t just about completing chores— they’re about teaching you something new about the rules of the timeloop system. With every “a-ha!” moment, your understanding will grow, preparing you for more complex challenges ahead.

Explore the Open World

Step into a richly interconnected world with no locked doors or ability gates - the progress is only limited by your knowledge and understanding of the game’s systems, not artificial unlocks. As you gain new insights, you’ll find yourself revisiting old areas and meta-puzzles with fresh perspectives, uncovering solutions that were hidden in plain sight the entire time.

Learn the Rules…

There is no hand-holding, explicit explanations, nor instructions. You’ll have to learn organically by trial and error and by applying lateral thinking. Master the rules of the timeloop system by piecing together clues from the environment and building on what you’ve learned before.

...And Break Them

The true magic of Timebound happens when you realize that the same rules you’ve mastered can also be bent or broken. As your understanding deepens, you’ll uncover new ways to manipulate the game’s systems, allowing you to achieve things you once thought impossible. Yes, you could have done that the entire time!

Key Features:

  • Nonlinear, Knowledge-based Progression - Explore a vast, interconnected world where your only limits are your knowledge and understanding of the world.

  • Unique Puzzle Design - Solve puzzles by manipulating local time loops and interacting with the environment in creative ways.

  • No Power-Ups, Just Knowledge - Gain insight, not items. The game never withholds abilities—only your understanding grows.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: An exploration puzzle metroidbrainia set in mystical ruins. Solve timeloop puzzles, explore the open world, learn the rules and break them.
